text: Bishop James Chan Soon Cheong, D.D. (; born 26 July 1926) is a retired Malaysian Catholic priest. Born in Selama, Perak, he was ordained a priest on 9 August 1959. He was appointed Bishop of Melaka-Johor on 22 December 1972. His episcopal ordination took place on 8 June 1973. He retired at the age of 75 years on 10 December 2001. == See also == *Roman Catholic Diocese of Malacca-Johor ==References== Category:1926 births Category:Malaysian Roman Catholic bishops Category:Living people Category:People from Perak
title: James Chan Soon Cheong
